name: Four of Pentacles
description: A figure tightly holding onto a pentacle, with two more under their feet and one on their head, symbolizing control, security, and materialism.
description_pl: Postać mocno trzymająca pentakl, z dwoma kolejnymi pod stopami i jednym na głowie, symbolizująca kontrolę, bezpieczeństwo i materializm.
upright_meaning: Security, control, and holding on to resources.
upright_meaning_pl: Bezpieczeństwo, kontrola i trzymanie się zasobów.
reversed_meaning: Greed, loss of control, and letting go.
significator_type: Represents material aspects, work, and finances.
significator_type_pl: Reprezentuje aspekty materialne, pracę i finanse.
